title.rendered: “Exclusive: IDF Strikes on Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon – Detailed Report and Footage Links”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Footage: IDF forces attacked Hezbollah terrorist targets including the organization’s terrorists in southern Lebanon.

During the day, IDF forces identified a terrorist entering a military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the area of ​​Ayta al-Shaab.
An aviation vessel attacked the building and the terrorist who was there.

Simultaneously, an aviation vessel attacked a terrorist who was in a military base of Hezbollah terrorist organization in the area of ​​Kfar Kila in southern Lebanon.

Attached is footage of the attack in the area of ​​Ayta al-Shaab: https://bit.ly/3UnFcou

Attached is footage of the attack in the area of ​​Kfar Kila: https://bit.ly/3WacfxE
